mapper.insert: INSERT INTO belongs( id, uuid, user_uuid, province_uuid, city_uuid, area_uuid, school_uuid, grade_uuid, class_uuid, child_uuid, type, created_time, modified_time, charged_type ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradeUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{childUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargedType, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM belongs WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

DELETE FROM belongs WHERE id in
#{item, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.uuid uuid, a.user_uuid userUuid, a.province_uuid provinceUuid, a.city_uuid cityUuid, a.area_uuid areaUuid, a.school_uuid schoolUuid, a.grade_uuid gradeUuid, a.class_uuid classUuid, a.child_uuid childUuid, a.type type, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createdTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.modified_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') modifiedTime, a.residence_flag residenceFlag, a.subject_uuid subjectUuid, a.charged_type chargedType, a.hikstudentid hikstudentid, a.yunhstudid yunhstudid, a.yunhstudcode yunhstudcode, a.yunhstudno yunhstudno, a.yunhteacherid yunhteacherid, a.yunhteachercode yunhteachercode FROM belongs a WHERE a.id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.id id, a.uuid uuid, a.user_uuid userUuid, a.province_uuid provinceUuid, a.city_uuid cityUuid, a.area_uuid areaUuid, a.school_uuid schoolUuid, a.grade_uuid gradeUuid, a.class_uuid classUuid, a.child_uuid childUuid, a.type type, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createdTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.modified_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') modifiedTime, a.residence_flag residenceFlag, a.subject_uuid subjectUuid, a.charged_type chargedType, a.hikstudentid hikstudentid, a.yunhstudid yunhstudid, a.yunhstudcode yunhstudcode, a.yunhstudno yunhstudno, a.yunhteacherid yunhteacherid, a.yunhteachercode yunhteachercode FROM belongs a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.id ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM belongs a WHERE 1=1
